description: Lists all the migration statuses for your applications. If you use the optional ApplicationIds parameter, only the migration statuses for those applications will be returned.

parameters.name: ApplicationIds
parameters.description: The configurationIds from the Application Discovery Service that uniquely identifies your applications. (string) ---

nested_items.name: ApplicationStateList
nested_items.description: A list of Applications that exist in Application Discovery Service.

nested_items.name: ApplicationId
nested_items.description: The configurationId from the Application Discovery Service that uniquely identifies an application.

nested_items.name: ApplicationStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of an application.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the application status was last updated.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If a NextToken was returned by a previous call, there are more results available. To retrieve the next page of results, make the call again using the returned token in NextToken.
